title: Should I take a course on Udemy? If no, which is the best site to learn online? - Quora

response.answer_text: Definitely Yes! Course offered at Udemy are pretty good & value for money even though if you didn't find any courses value for money then you have the option of 30 days return & believe me the return policy & process is hassle free. They have offers round the clock, I myself lookout for offer to buy desirable courses at the best suitable prices.
